QuestData.Title: Peace Offering
QuestData.Description: We need allies amongst these spires, and quickly. Commander, I believe it would be wise if you sought out aid.$B$BThere is a lone arakkoa outcast southeast of here living near a ravager nest. The ravagers do not attack him - I suspect he has information on the beasts we may be able to use.$B$BI have our last crate of cactus apple surprise ready for you. It is our best shot, $Gsir:madame;.
QuestData.LogDescription: Deliver the Crate of Cactus Apple Surprise to Dusk-Seer Irizzar in the Spires of Arak.
QuestData.RewardText: I believe we can come to an arrangement, savior of Skettis. But first...
